alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 03 at 4:26AM AKST until March 06 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A series of weather fronts will produce periods of snow through the weekend and into Monday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
